description: An overview of system monitoring and docker monitoring. (cadvisor, Prometheus, Node Explorer)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  created AS "time",
  lat
FROM speedtester_serversmodel
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created)
ORDER BY 1

targets.expr: min((node_filesystem_size_bytes{device="/dev/root", fstype="ext4", instance="node-exporter:9100", job="prometheus", mountpoint="/etc/hostname"} - node_filesystem_free_bytes{device="/dev/root", fstype="ext4", instance="node-exporter:9100", job="prometheus", mountpoint="/etc/hostname"} )/ node_filesystem_size_bytes{device="/dev/root", fstype="ext4", instance="node-exporter:9100", job="prometheus", mountpoint="/etc/hostname"})

(node_filesystem_size_bytes{device="/dev/root", fstype="ext4", instance="node-exporter:9100", job="prometheus", mountpoint="/etc/hostname"} - node_filesystem_free_bytes{device="/dev/root", fstype="ext4", instance="node-exporter:9100", job="prometheus", mountpoint="/etc/hostname"})

title: System & Docker Monitoring
